name: HowManyDays
0:
”Alexa, open How Many Days”
”Alexa, start How Many Days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how many days
des:
Simply say, Alexa how many days? And she will remind you how many days until graduation. Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your upcoming events. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
